title: CRITICAL INJURY
description: The character suffers an especially severe wound. Roll on the Critical Injuries table.

title: GASH
description: A deep wound cuts into the character’s chest (-5 CON).

title: IMPAIRED ARM
description: The hit wounds the character’s arm, making it difficult to move (-5 to all actions that imply the use of hands).

title: IMPAIRED LEG
description: A direct hit to the leg causes the character to lose mobility (-5 DEX).

title: INFECTED WOUND
description: The wound has been quickly infected—it requires Antibiotics soon or it may never heal (see Infected, pg 85).

title: BROKEN RIBS
description: A violent hit to the rib cage shatters a few ribs (-2 Stamina).

title: SLASHED LEG
description: The character’s leg suffers a deep cut, making it difficult to maneuver (no defensive maneuvers allowed).

title: BANGED HEAD
description: The character suffers a hit to the head. The shock makes them lose their next turn.

title: DAMAGED VISION
description: The character suffers a hit to the face, blurring their vision (-5 to all actions).

title: BRAIN DAMAGE
description: The character suffers a severe hit to the head, damaging their brain and causing partial amnesia (-80 Experience Points).

title: CRUSHED FINGERS
description: A direct hit to the character’s hand damages their fingers (-5 to Combat Skills).

title: SUPERFICIAL WOUND
description: The character suffers an ugly-looking but superficial cut. No effect.

title: BRUISED BRAIN
description: The character suffers a blow to the back of the head, temporarily confusing them (-5 INT).

title: SLASHED EAR
description: The character’s ear is damaged, reducing their hearing (-5 Perception).

title: SLIT BICEP
description: The character receives an ugly cut to the bicep (-5 STR).

title: SCRATCHED BROW
description: Their brow suffers a deep scratch, bleeding profusely and requiring a full round to clear their vision.

title: DAMAGED NERVES
description: The character suffers nerve damage that induces seizures. Roll a D6 each turn—on a 1 they cannot act.

title: BLOOD LOSS
description: A deep wound to their stomach begins bleeding profusely (+2 to all damage received).

title: SAVAGE BLOW
description: The injury was so violent that the character gains 1 Trauma (pg 98).

title: TORN TO PIECES
description: Miraculously the blow was absorbed by clothing. Any gear worn on the wound’s location is destroyed.
